titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon preached upon the sad occasion of the death of that emiment and faithful servant of Christ, Mr. Thomas Rosewell who departed this life February the 4th : and whose remains were interred February th 19th. 1691/2 / by Mathew Mead.
titleStmt.author: Mead, Matthew, 1630?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
